column4: hello my internet connection is extremely slow and i don know why. Ideas on troubleshooting?
My internet connection is extremely slow and i don't know why. Ideas on troubleshooting?
Maybe you using IPv6? Before I disabled that my internet was ultra slow
i will double check but i don't think so
i just cant understand what changed
What did you do recently to do with system settings? Or with the router/network-interface?
Have you tried another operating system on the same connection?
that is the weird part, i did not change anything. No one else is using my bandwith it is wired.
Have you tried any other OS on this network?
but i have used other browsers, i use Firefox primarily
You could try booting to a livecd of a linux distro... or a windows Live CD (they exist) and seeing if it's an issue with your primary OS or the network.
Did you try measuring your speed quantifiably, like with speedtest.net?
I had that and it was because IPV6 was enabled. Try disabling it in Firefox via about:config
